00029 #if defined(RETARGET_USART)
00030 #include "em_usart.h"
00031 #endif

00033 #if defined(RETARGET_LEUART)
00034 #include "em_leuart.h"

00037 /* Receive buffer */
00038 #define RXBUFSIZE    8                          
00039 static volatile int     rxReadIndex  = 0;       
00040 static volatile int     rxWriteIndex = 0;       
00041 static volatile int     rxCount      = 0;       
00042 static volatile uint8_t rxBuffer[RXBUFSIZE];    
00043 static uint8_t          LFtoCRLF    = 0;        
00044 static bool             initialized = false;    
00046 /**************************************************************************/
00049 void RETARGET_IRQ_NAME(void)
00050 {
00051 #if defined(RETARGET_USART)
00052   if (RETARGET_UART->STATUS & USART_STATUS_RXDATAV)
00053   {
00054 #else
00055   if (RETARGET_UART->IF & LEUART_IF_RXDATAV)
00056   {
00057 #endif
00058 
00059     /* Store Data */
00060     rxBuffer[rxWriteIndex] = RETARGET_RX(RETARGET_UART);
00061     rxWriteIndex++;
00062     rxCount++;
00063     if (rxWriteIndex == RXBUFSIZE)
00064     {
00065       rxWriteIndex = 0;
00066     }
00067     /* Check for overflow - flush buffer */
00068     if (rxCount > RXBUFSIZE)
00069     {
00070       rxWriteIndex = 0;
00071       rxCount      = 0;
00072       rxReadIndex  = 0;
00073     }
00074   }
00075 }

00079 /**************************************************************************/
00083 void RETARGET_SerialCrLf(int on)
00084 {
00085   if (on)
00086     LFtoCRLF = 1;
00087   else
00088     LFtoCRLF = 0;
00089 }

00092 /**************************************************************************/
00095 void RETARGET_SerialInit(void)
00096 {
00097   /* Enable peripheral clocks */
00098   CMU_ClockEnable(cmuClock_HFPER, true);
00099   /* Configure GPIO pins */
00100   CMU_ClockEnable(cmuClock_GPIO, true);
00101   /* To avoid false start, configure output as high */
00102   GPIO_PinModeSet(RETARGET_TXPORT, RETARGET_TXPIN, gpioModePushPull, 1);
00103   GPIO_PinModeSet(RETARGET_RXPORT, RETARGET_RXPIN, gpioModeInput, 0);
00104 
00105 #if defined(RETARGET_USART)
00106   USART_TypeDef           *usart = RETARGET_UART;
00107   USART_InitAsync_TypeDef init   = USART_INITASYNC_DEFAULT;
00108 
00109   /* Enable DK RS232/UART switch */
00110   RETARGET_PERIPHERAL_ENABLE();
00111 
00112   CMU_ClockEnable(RETARGET_CLK, true);
00113 
00114   /* Configure USART for basic async operation */
00115   init.enable = usartDisable;
00116   USART_InitAsync(usart, &init);
00117 
00118   /* Enable pins at correct UART/USART location. */
00119   #if defined( USART_ROUTEPEN_RXPEN )
00120   usart->ROUTEPEN = USART_ROUTEPEN_RXPEN | USART_ROUTEPEN_TXPEN;
00121   usart->ROUTELOC0 = ( usart->ROUTELOC0 &
00122                        ~( _USART_ROUTELOC0_TXLOC_MASK
00123                           | _USART_ROUTELOC0_RXLOC_MASK ) )
00124                      | ( RETARGET_TX_LOCATION << _USART_ROUTELOC0_TXLOC_SHIFT )
00125                      | ( RETARGET_RX_LOCATION << _USART_ROUTELOC0_RXLOC_SHIFT );
00126   #else
00127   usart->ROUTE = USART_ROUTE_RXPEN | USART_ROUTE_TXPEN | RETARGET_LOCATION;
00128   #endif
00129 
00130   /* Clear previous RX interrupts */
00131   USART_IntClear(RETARGET_UART, USART_IF_RXDATAV);
00132   NVIC_ClearPendingIRQ(RETARGET_IRQn);
00133 
00134   /* Enable RX interrupts */
00135   USART_IntEnable(RETARGET_UART, USART_IF_RXDATAV);
00136   NVIC_EnableIRQ(RETARGET_IRQn);
00137 
00138   /* Finally enable it */
00139   USART_Enable(usart, usartEnable);
00140 
00141 #else
00142   LEUART_TypeDef      *leuart = RETARGET_UART;
00143   LEUART_Init_TypeDef init    = LEUART_INIT_DEFAULT;
00144 
00145   /* Enable DK LEUART/RS232 switch */
00146   RETARGET_PERIPHERAL_ENABLE();
00147 
00148   /* Enable CORE LE clock in order to access LE modules */
00149   CMU_ClockEnable(cmuClock_CORELE, true);
00150 
00151 #if defined(RETARGET_VCOM)
00152   /* Select HFXO/2 for LEUARTs (and wait for it to stabilize) */
00153   CMU_ClockSelectSet(cmuClock_LFB, cmuSelect_CORELEDIV2);
00154 #else
00155   /* Select LFXO for LEUARTs (and wait for it to stabilize) */
00156   CMU_ClockSelectSet(cmuClock_LFB, cmuSelect_LFXO);
00157 #endif
00158 
00159   CMU_ClockEnable(RETARGET_CLK, true);
00160 
00161   /* Do not prescale clock */
00162   CMU_ClockDivSet(RETARGET_CLK, cmuClkDiv_1);
00163 
00164   /* Configure LEUART */
00165   init.enable = leuartDisable;
00166 #if defined(RETARGET_VCOM)
00167   init.baudrate = 115200;
00168 #endif
00169   LEUART_Init(leuart, &init);
00170   /* Enable pins at default location */
00171   leuart->ROUTE = LEUART_ROUTE_RXPEN | LEUART_ROUTE_TXPEN | RETARGET_LOCATION;
00172 
00173   /* Clear previous RX interrupts */
00174   LEUART_IntClear(RETARGET_UART, LEUART_IF_RXDATAV);
00175   NVIC_ClearPendingIRQ(RETARGET_IRQn);
00176 
00177   /* Enable RX interrupts */
00178   LEUART_IntEnable(RETARGET_UART, LEUART_IF_RXDATAV);
00179   NVIC_EnableIRQ(RETARGET_IRQn);
00180 
00181   /* Finally enable it */
00182   LEUART_Enable(leuart, leuartEnable);
00183 #endif
00184 
00185 #if !defined(__CROSSWORKS_ARM) && defined(__GNUC__)
00186   setvbuf(stdout, NULL, _IONBF, 0);   /*Set unbuffered mode for stdout (newlib)*/
00187 #endif
00188 
00189   initialized = true;
00190 }

00193 /**************************************************************************/
00197 int RETARGET_ReadChar(void)
00198 {
00199   int c = -1;
00200 
00201   if (initialized == false)
00202   {
00203     RETARGET_SerialInit();
00204   }
00205 
00206   INT_Disable();
00207   if (rxCount > 0)
00208   {
00209     c = rxBuffer[rxReadIndex];
00210     rxReadIndex++;
00211     if (rxReadIndex == RXBUFSIZE)
00212     {
00213       rxReadIndex = 0;
00214     }
00215     rxCount--;
00216   }
00217   INT_Enable();
00218 
00219   return c;
00220 }
00221 
00222 /**************************************************************************/
00227 int RETARGET_WriteChar(char c)
00228 {
00229   if (initialized == false)
00230   {
00231     RETARGET_SerialInit();
00232   }
00233 
00234   /* Add CR or LF to CRLF if enabled */
00235   if (LFtoCRLF && (c == '\n'))
00236   {
00237     RETARGET_TX(RETARGET_UART, '\r');
00238   }
00239   RETARGET_TX(RETARGET_UART, c);
00240 
00241   if (LFtoCRLF && (c == '\r'))
00242   {
00243     RETARGET_TX(RETARGET_UART, '\n');
00244   }
00245 
00246   return c;
00247 }
